text: ARIES — RECOVERY PHASES Phase #1 - Analysis — Read WAL from last checkpoint to identify dirty pages in the buffer pool and active txns at the time of the crash. Phase #2 - Redo — Repeat all actions starting from an appropriate point in the log (even txns that will abort). Phase #3 - Undo — Reverse the actions of txns that did not commit before B7 the crash. -~ £2CMUDB . 4 D PI o) 51:27/1:18:06 - ARIES - RECOVERY PHASES > [c c I « 2 I e - PE 21- ARIES Database Recovery (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
